mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PostCommunity (user_id, habit_id, image_url, content, hashtag) VALUES (#{userId}, #{habitId}, #{imageURL}, #{content}, #{hashtag})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PostCommunity ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT mh.*, h.habit_title, h.category_title FROM MyHabit mh JOIN Habit h ON mh.habit_id = h.habit_id WHERE mh.user_id = #{userId} AND mh.state = '진행'
SELECT u.name, u.avatar FROM postcommunity p JOIN Users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.post_id = #{postId}
